page.title: 05Shobrooke Mrs Fey.
page.content: Mrs Fey lives at School Close in Shobrooke. Mrs Fey has lived there for 65 years. She lived in Cheriton Fitzpaine for 12 years and then got a job working Ford Farm near Cheriton Fitzpaine, and then for the Shelleys at Shobrooke Park as a house maid.Mrs Fey enjoys living in Shobrooke except there are a lot of new people around which she calls 'outsiders'. School Close and Silver Way are both new, before that there were allotments and fields there. Mrs Fey can't do her own shopping as she has had an operation so her daughter-in-law does it for her. Her husband was awarded a long service medal for 50 years in agricultural work by H.R.H. Princess Anne. Mrs Fey has 3 children, 10 grandchildren and 7 great grandchildren.
